title: Receive a Shipment Without a PO
description: A truck arrives with a shipment that is not linked to a purchase order in the system. The operator must handle this exception.

tasks.description: Attempt to scan the shipment's paperwork, but the system finds no matching purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system correctly identifies that there is no PO for this shipment.

tasks.description: Create an 'unidentified receipt' record, capturing the carrier name and BOL number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a record for the mystery shipment.

tasks.description: Move the shipment to a designated holding area for exceptions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shipment is moved to a safe place pending investigation.

tasks.description: The system sends an alert to the purchasing department to investigate the unidentified receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct department is notified to resolve the PO issue.
